channel.title: UI design and development
channel.description: Recent content on UI design and development

item.title: Working on Ambitious Projects: Jonathan Blow on Game Design
item.description:
It’s not a typical this is how I do it speach. It’s definitely not one of those top ten ways… pieces.

It’s got strong emphasis on mental and philosophical side of creating complicated things. It’s about handling negative emtions, picking the right thing to work on, creative process.

67 minutes

item.title: Looking at Craftsmen
item.description:
I enjoy looking at craftsmen at work. You can learn from it by seeing the process, tricks of the trade, work on details that most people won’t even notice.

It doesn’t matter that it’s not my field. It’s about mentality.

Video made by Wranglerstar.
